title: Authors and Citation
text: Lepore M (2023). bundesbank: Helpers Bundesbank. R package version 0.0.0.9001, https://2degreesinvesting.github.io/bundesbank/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {bundesbank: Helpers for Bundesbank},   author = {Mauro Lepore},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9001},   url = {https://2degreesinvesting.github.io/bundesbank/}, }

title: Helpers for Bundesbank
code: library(bundesbank) library(tibble)  data <- tibble(company_name = "Peter GmbH & Co. KG, Berlin") data %>%   add_name_from("company_name") %>%   add_city_from("company_name") #> # A tibble: 1 × 3 #>   company_name                name                city   #>   <chr>                       <chr>               <chr>  #> 1 Peter GmbH & Co. KG, Berlin Peter GmbH & Co. KG Berlin  # Assumes that 'name' is after the last comma. If not the output is wrong. data <- tibble(company_name = "bad, name") data %>%   add_name_from("company_name") #> # A tibble: 1 × 2 #>   company_name name  #>   <chr>        <chr> #> 1 bad, name    bad  # Assumes that 'city' is after the last comma. If not the output is wrong. data <- tibble(company_name = "city, bad") data %>%   add_city_from("company_name") #> # A tibble: 1 × 2 #>   company_name city  #>   <chr>        <chr> #> 1 city, bad    bad

what: Extract a pattern from a string in a data frame column — add_name_from
title: Extract a pattern from a string in a data frame column — add_name_from
text: Extract pattern string data frame column

title: Extract a pattern from a string in a data frame column — add_name_from
code: add_name_from(data, col, pattern = "^[^,]+")  add_city_from(data, col, pattern = "[^,]+$")

title: Extract a pattern from a string in a data frame column — add_name_from
text: data data frame. col name column, e.g. "company_name". pattern pattern extract col.

title: Extract a pattern from a string in a data frame column — add_name_from
text: data frame new column containing extracted text.

title: Extract a pattern from a string in a data frame column — add_name_from
code: library(tibble)  data <- tibble(company_name = "Peter GmbH & Co. KG, Berlin") data %>%   add_name_from("company_name") %>%   add_city_from("company_name") #> # A tibble: 1 × 3 #>   company_name                name                city   #>   <chr>                       <chr>               <chr>  #> 1 Peter GmbH & Co. KG, Berlin Peter GmbH & Co. KG Berlin  # Assumes that 'name' is after the last comma. If not the output is wrong. data <- tibble(company_name = "bad, name") data %>%   add_name_from("company_name") #> # A tibble: 1 × 2 #>   company_name name  #>   <chr>        <chr> #> 1 bad, name    bad    # Assumes that 'city' is after the last comma. If not the output is wrong. data <- tibble(company_name = "city, bad") data %>%   add_city_from("company_name") #> # A tibble: 1 × 2 #>   company_name city  #>   <chr>        <chr> #> 1 city, bad    bad
